---
id: delete-guide-comment
title: "Delete Guide Comment"
description: "Delete a comment from a guide profile. Successful request will return `204 No Content`  and fire a __GUIDE_COMMENT_DELETED__ event."

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete Guide Comment"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/games/{game-id}/guides/{guide-id}/comments/{comment-id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Delete a comment from a guide profile. Successful request will return `204 No Content`  and fire a __GUIDE_COMMENT_DELETED__ event.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"game-id","in":"path","description":"Game ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":1},{"name":"guide-id","in":"path","description":"Guide ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":2},{"name":"comment-id","in":"path","description":"Comment ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"example":3}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"204":{"description":"Successful Request. No Body Returned.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"204","type":"object","default":"204 No Content"}}}},"403":{"description":"The authenticated user does not have permission to delete comments for this guide, this action is restricted to game team managers & administrators only.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Error Object","description":"Standard API error response.","properties":{"error":{"description":"Contains error data.","properties":{"code":{"description":"The [HTTP code](/restapi/introduction#response-codes).","type":"integer","format":"int32","default":403},"error_ref":{"description":"The mod.io error code.","type":"integer","default":10000},"message":{"description":"The server response to your request. Responses will vary depending on the endpoint, but the object structure will persist.","type":"string","default":"You do not have the required permissions to access this resource."},"errors":{"description":"Optional Validation errors object. This field is only supplied if the response is a validation error `422 Unprocessible Entity`. See [errors documentation](/restapi/errors) for more information.","type":"object"}},"type":"object"}},"type":"object"}}},"x-errorrefs":{"19027":"The authenticated user does not have permission to delete comments for this guide, this action is restricted to game team managers & administrators only."}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
